title: Failed Experiments
description:
Pablo Torre, Domonique Foxworth and Israel Gutierrez debate what they will think of the entire Nets experiment if they get swept tonight and if people have been too easy on Ja Morant for his performance in this series.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN
itunes:subtitle: (debatable): How Will This Nets Team Be Remembered? What To Make Of Memphis?
